title: Salvation: Night Horses MC
description: Megan:  I never wanted my prom night to end up like that, crying in my dress at three o'clock in the morning at a truck stop. I'd have a dozen bad nights, though, without a thought, if it let me meet him.  Merle:  I knew I needed more in my life, knew I had to find something to live for, but a high school girl? Sure, she wasn't jailbait, but she was young, and I couldn't let her get mixed up in my life.  The Night Horses MC Serial, parts 1-4, in novel form. Check out the Author Interview for a hint about what's to come - you can't read it anywhere else!
author: Sarah Sorana
